meanings.definition: To change in form or appearance
meanings.sent1: The magician transfigures a rabbit into a hat.
meanings.sent2: The caterpillar transfigures into a butterfly.
meanings.sent3: The costume party transfigures ordinary people into superheroes.
meanings.sent4: The sunrise transfigures the sky into a canvas of colors.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brush transfigures a blank canvas into a masterpiece.

meanings.definition: To transform into something more beautiful or elevated
meanings.sent1: The fairy godmother transfigures a pumpkin into a carriage.
meanings.sent3: The chef transfigures simple ingredients into a gourmet meal.
meanings.sent4: Music transfigures the atmosphere into a realm of emotions.
meanings.sent5: Love transfigures the ordinary into the extraordinary.
